text:
NAEB RADIO NETWORK
43
PROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
BONUS Title: THE CURTAIN RISES BONUS
Type: Drama
Time: 59:00
No.: 13 programs
Origin: FBS-WNIC
Audience: Adult
Serial Number: 57-25B
Release Date: Issue 14 (April 7)
Each program in this series takes us on an imaginary trip to one of the Parisian
theatres where we learn not only the history of the theatre and its personalities,
but we get a chance to hear present members of the theatre doing excerpts from
famous plays in French.
Only the excerpts from the plays are in French; the rest of all the programs are
in English.
